stream.output

Class OutputCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • stream.StreamCore
      • stream.output.OutputCore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutputCompress, OutputCrypt, OutputSplit

    public abstract class OutputCore
extends StreamCore
    Abstract class which extends the generic StreamCore. Used for write with writeParts() and for create the header file. Update the StreamCore.successfulFlag if some error occur
    Author:
    Meschio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OutputCore(java.lang.String srcPath, FileElement data)
      Constructor of OutputCore, call the parent constructor StreamCore, set the StreamCore.fileProgress and create the headerFile.

      • writeParts

        public void writeParts()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        writeParts specialized class of OutputCore(java.lang.String, logic.FileElement) for split a file and write on it.

        Update the StreamCore.data status of the operation for the TableView set the StreamCore.successfulFlag to false if some error occur. rely of the set setOutputStream(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int) and get getOutputStream() specialized in the inherited class, and rely to handleMethodStartOperation(int) and handleMethodEndOperation() for cycle operations specialized in the inherited class

        Specified by:
        writeParts in class StreamCore
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception
